summary: Two neurology students create a telepathy experiment together to visualize a murderer, who recently knifed another student.
cast: Jason Kulas|Peggy McClellan|Scott Winters|Casey McDougal|Joan-Marie Dewsnap|William York|Tristan Cole|Kyle Patrick Darling|Diane Henderson|Christine McFadyen|Kathleen McGourthy|Katarina Morhacova|Mary Niederkorn|Gregory Seymore|Charles Stiles|Alex Winston
title: After Last Season
